Comment: There are two independents in the U.S. senate who usually tie their elections to the democrats. There is Sanders who is among the most progressive senators and Angus King (Maine) who is one of the most moderate senators in the chamber.  Because they caucus with the democrats they are recognized as independents but usually lumped together in counters such as who controls the chamber.
